actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the right of all of the people of Ireland to control Ireland's destiny.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the people of Ireland, including Northern Ireland, have a right to control their own political destiny. Urges the President to adopt and pursue policies which are consistent with such right.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the right of all of the people of Ireland to control Ireland's destiny.
